duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare all third party cost reports, amend as needed, and coordinate audits.
Gather data for completion of cost reports from various sources.
Analyze data from all sources to ensure accuracy and consistency.
Prepare reimbursement budget models with accuracy using the most current regulations.
Prepare Uniform Report for the WV Healthcare Authority annually and resolve variances independently.
Verify and analyze interim rate calculations and final settlements for accuracy.
Maintain and improve technical skills needed to manipulate data.
Prepare data for various consultant reimbursement projects.
Maintain report writing skills in specific systems as needed.
Maintain and update all third party cost report computer software systems.
Review state and federal regulations to analyze reimbursement impact of changes.
Compile data for Medicaid DSH Survey and DSH audit annually, and review audit adjustments.
Prepare monthly contractual reserve analysis and necessary journal entries.
Prepare data for Wage Index reviews and Occupational Mix surveys.
Calculate third party receivables and payables monthly, prepare necessary journal entries, and maintain detailed schedules.
Participate in meeting department objectives and goals.
Contribute positively to department teamwork, problem-solving, and performance improvement.
Complete interim rate request form on assigned hospitals and distribute updated rates to internal departments.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in business administration, accounting, or finance (Master's preferred)
